name: Vanilla
info: A Sinner highly contaminated by DisSea. Can block 2 enemies at the same time. Gains 2 M-Value each time damage is received, up to 10 M-Value per second. Enters [Corruption State] when M-Value reaches 60, gain a 15% Max HP increase while consuming 4 M-Value per second. When the M-Value reaches 0, the [Corruption State] will end.
criminalRecord:
The subject was once part of the Black Ring Expedition, mainly responsible for logistical equipment maintenance. Due to her exceptional machine operation skills, she also participated in several important battles.\nFor ten years, she had been working alone at the DisSea Observation Outpost established right after Nightfall, where she monitored and kept records of DisSea. She later joined the expedition.

--

Currently detained by the MBCC. No significant abnormalities or harmful incidents have been observed to date. The subject remains within the control of the MBCC.
mutationAssessment:
+++* Ability Summary
The subject uses a contaminated mechanical exoskeleton for combat. With its beyond-science transformation capabilities and extreme strength, it brings destruction in battle with its mass alone and is almost insusceptible to attacks.

+++* Awakening Signs
The subject appeared on the day of the full Illusory Moon and was personally detained by the Chief of the MBCC. Her body was severely corrupted by contamination, turning her mind completely into that of a Corruptor.

+++* Corruption State
In a state of total corruption. Entire body covered in crystalline contamination and almost completely devoid of humanity and rationality. Extremely dangerous.
shortSummary: AoE Physical burst damage scaling off Max HP

exclusiveCrimebrand.name: Endpoint
exclusiveCrimebrand.description: Block limit increases by 1. New Exclusive Ultimate [Eternity Leap]. Vanilla immediately gains 25 M-Value, then leaps into the target grid and deals (Max HP * 100% / 125% / 150%) Physical Damage to all enemies within the 3x3 square around her. [Eternity Leap] has a 15-second cooldown time after each use and can only be used twice per battle.

media.title: JP Vanilla Character Trailer
media.author: 無期迷途 [むきめいと] ー公式ー

guide.title: Summary
guide.text: Despite being Endura Tendency, functionally, Vanilla is closer to a Fury Sinner. Vanilla's intended role is DPS rather than tank, capable of dishing out impressive Physical burst damage. The downside however, is that the number of buffs Vanilla benefits from is lesser due to scaling off Max HP rather than Attack, but most of all, getting Vanilla into [Corruption State] reliably without high shackles/personal weekly buff is difficult. Many players may also find her clunky to play, as piloting Vanilla efficiently will require AC-ing for M-Value and planning ahead where you want your P1 to land.

pros: High Max HP for tanking and McQueen synergy
cons: Difficult to get into [Corruption State] quickly without high Shackles
Doesn't benefit from Atk or Crit buffs

crimebrandSets.name: Moon + Contamination
crimebrandSets.note: Vanilla's highest damage set if Contamination passive is regularly up. Suitable on certain RoD maps where Chief energy is aplenty. If running Heavy Contamination is not suitable, you may run Pioneer or Creation in third slot instead.

crimebrandSets.name: Imaginary Gambit
crimebrandSets.note: When your movement count is an odd number, provides Vanilla a sizeable damage increase. When your movement count is even, Vanilla is healed. Great flexible comfort set for Vanilla in content such as story/Mania Training.

crimebrandSets.name: Embrace of the Dead
crimebrandSets.note: BFL main DPS set. If running this set, do not use Vanilla's Ult to break as you will not get the bonus.

crimebrandSets.name: Melodious Belltower
crimebrandSets.note: If you can finish the battle 30 seconds or less. BFL speedrun set.

crimebrandSets.name: Tuning + City + Corridor
crimebrandSets.note: Tuning and Corridor provide Vanilla energy so she can get her Ult up in time for breaking, and City adds some damage.

crimebrandSets.name: Host + Bulwark
crimebrandSets.note: For when you are using Vanilla more as a tank than DPS in gamemodes such as main story or Mania Training. With Bulwark equipped, Vanilla can block up to 4 enemies, which also increases the value she gets out of In Host's Name.

crimebrandSets.name: Fury + Bulwark + Palace
crimebrandSets.note: If using Vanilla as a tank rather than DPS. Fury heals Vanilla when she Ults and Rift Palace reduces the damage of enemies who hit Vanilla.

shackles.title: Sempiternity
shackles.description: Every time an allied unit casts the Ultimate, Vanilla gains a 5% increase in Max HP. This effect can stack up to 4 times.

shackles.title: Time Dilation
shackles.description: Vanilla gains 1 additional M-Value every time she takes damage, and the maximum M-Value she can gain per second increases by 5. In [Corruption State], gain 2 M-Value per second.

shackles.title: Energy Overflowing
shackles.description: At the start of the battle, Vanilla gains 25 M-value.

skills.name: Exoskeleton Arm
skills.description: Vanilla atttacks with her two fists alternately, dealing (Attack * 85%) Physical Damage each time.

skills.name: Potential Charge

upgrade.description:
[Kinetic Release] damage coefficient is increased to $0%.
[Corrosion State]: [Kinetic Release] damage coefficient is increased to $0%.

skills.description:
[Potential Charge]: Vanilla charges up, restoring 4% Max HP per second and switching her Ultimate to [Kinetic Release] for 10 seconds. If [Kinetic Release] is not used within this period, her Ultimate is switched back to [Potential Charge] and she then gains 10 Energy.
[Kinetic Release]: Vanilla unleashes a heavy punch, dealing (Max HP * 75%) Physical Damage and 1 Core Damage to all enemies within the 3x3 square in front. Meanwhile, her Ultimate is switched to [Potential Charge].
[Corruption State]: [Potential Charge] now restores 8% Max HP per second and [Kinetic Release] now deals 125% damage and 1 additional Core Damage.

skills.name: Meshing Gears
skills.description:
After Vanilla deals damage with four normal attacks, the next normal attack triggers [Mesh].
[Mesh]: Deals (Max HP * 12.5%) Physical Damage to all enemies within the 3x3 square in front. Meanwhile, she gains 5 M-Value.
[Corruption State]: After using [Kinetic Release], [Mesh] is automatically triggered once every second for 2 seconds.

skills.name: One-way Drivetrain
skills.description: Damage dealt by [Mesh] increases by 15%. When [Mesh] hits only one enemy, the damage dealt is additionally increased by 25%.

upgrade.description: Increase the damage dealt by [Mesh] by 30%. When [Mesh] targets only one enemy, the damage dealt is additionally increased by $0%.

compliance: Unlock File: Performance in Serving Term, TBA +TBA
Unlock Voice: Special Conversation 1, TBA +TBA, Unlock Mission: TBA.
Unlock File: Performance in Serving Term
Unlock Voice: Special Conversation 3, Unlock Mission: Complete Interrogation.
Unlock File: Performance in Serving Term, Unlock Sticker
Unlock File: Performance in Serving Term, Unlock Voice: Full Compliance, Unlock Sinner Title: TBA
arrestRec1: Vanilla. Female. Height: Approximately 175cm in her infected state. Her body has endured years of contamination and is covered in an extremely tough exoskeleton, under which her clothes from before her mutation are still visible. The Chief of the MBCC has awakened her remaining consciousness with the shackles. She is currently detained in a solitary cell, awaiting psychic diving.
arrestRec2: After completing the psychic diving, the subject will continue to be observed in solitary confinement. According to observation logs, the subject shows some response to external stimuli but lacks further interest. However, she exhibits strong emotional fluctuations and mental agitation when Chief presents to her a certain pocket watch.
arrestRec3: Due to the subject's habit of logging her observations, while she's being closely observed and documented, the subject also observes and studies Chief at a close distance. Her research materials have now been compiled into a volume.
arrestRec4: The subject is highly experienced in vehicle operation. She once evaded arrests and fled the Bureau with Chief and later returned voluntarily on the same day. The subject offered no explanation for this, but according to Chief, she simply turned back after observing the Black Ring for a brief moment. No casualties resulted from this incident, but Chief has since refused to ride in any vehicle driven by the subject.
servingTerm1: After being detained during the Illusory Moon operation in DisSea, the subject has been placed in solitary confinement for observation and treatment. Since all current communication methods have proven futile, the MBCC has received the order for Chief to personally conduct dream dives with the subject.
servingTerm2: Before her mutation, the subject was a staff member at the DisSea Observation Outpost. Her parents were scientists who worked at the outpost at the dawn of Nightfall and disappeared around N.F. 11.
servingTerm3: In the last ten years of the outpost's operation, the subject was left alone in the station. Nonetheless, she continued to perform daily maintenance duties on her own, ensuring the basic functions of the outpost.
servingTerm4: The subject crafted a military-grade trekking mecha alone to break through the temporal storms of DisSea. During the creation of the mech, her mind was exposed to chaotic time for an extended period and was eventually obliterated by it. The Vanilla observed now is believed to be her lingering thoughts attached to her mech.
emotionCheck1:
[Vanilla has made some modifications to her room.] 

**Vanilla:** You're here... to see my work... All damage... can be repaired... 

**Chief:** ......

* **Prompt:** Such a clever mechanical design. 
 * **Vanilla:** Mechanical repair completed... I won't be damaged... No deviation... 
 * **Vanilla:** 😦

* **Prompt:** But there's one problem. The door is sealed shut. How are you going to get out? 
 * **Vanilla:** No exit... DisSea... Have I returned here again? 
 * **Vanilla:**  😥
supervision1:
++* ⚠ Repair Reservation

//The Bureau receives a maintenance assistance request from another department.//

**System Notifications:** Other departments wish to regularly send over severely battle-damaged machinery for Vanilla to repair. The schedule for repair appointments is already fully booked for this year.

* **Prompt:** Agree anyway
supervision2:
++* ⚠ Special Music

//Vanilla's healing music is quite unique.//

**System Notifications:** The therapist finds that ordinary music has no effect on Vanilla. The sound that can regulate Vanilla's mood is the steady, uniform ticking of a clock.

* **Prompt:** Note it down
supervision3:
++* ⚠⚠ Honor the Agreement

//The Supervision System notices Vanilla lingering in the Training Room for an extended period.//

**System Notifications:** Supervision System:
Abnormal behavior of Sinner Vanilla detected. The Sinner has been occupying the Training Room for too long. Proceed to inspect?

* **Prompt:** Yes

**System Notifications:** You arrive at the Training Room only to find Vanilla sitting calmly by herself. She notices your arrival and greets you.

**Vanilla:** You're here.

**Chief:** Yes, to check on you. Vanilla, what are you doing?

**Vanilla:** Time can be warped... To avoid discrepancies... Arrived early... at the agreed location.

* **Prompt:** Try to decipher

**Chief:** Are you waiting for someone here?

**Vanilla:** Yes, you.

* **Prompt:** Suddenly realize

**Chief:** Right! We scheduled a combat training session. But you didn't need to come here three days early to wait for me.

**Chief:** Don't worry, you're already out of DisSea. Space-time distortion won't happen for now.

**Vanilla:** I see... Then I'll rectify the ineffective and excessive waiting behavior... Calibrate the time...

**Vanilla:** Three days later... I'll come again... to honor the agreement.

**Chief:** Alright, see you in three days.
supervision4:
++* ⚠⚠ Potential Collaboration

//The internal research department proposes a study on Vanilla.//

**System Notifications:** The Bureau's research department submitted a task objective: to study the feasibility of Vanilla cooperating with others on missions.

* **Prompt:** Confirm

**System Notifications:** Vanilla has been spending a lot of time alone without interacting with others. Given her unique situation, you decide to first observe her attitude toward the other Sinners.

**System Notifications:** You and Vanilla stay at a distance, watching the others. She notices a group of people horsing around in the Outdoor Activity Area.

* **Prompt:** Ask what she thinks

**Vanilla:** Are they fighting... They pose no threat to me...

* **Prompt:** Explain

**Chief:** No, their playful fighting is just for fun and free of hostility. Those people are trustworthy companions.

**Vanilla:** Companions?

**Chief:** That's right. Do you want to join them?

**Vanilla:** Not interested...

**Vanilla:** Why would companions fight... Need to eliminate malfunctions... I can help with the maintenance... Optimize their brains and limbs with mechanical enhancements.

* **Prompt:** Submit report

**Chief:** Further observation is needed.
supervision5:
++* ⚠⚠⚠ Biocontrol

//Vanilla installs an automatic irrigation and fertilization system in the greenhouse.//

**System Notifications:** Vanilla is creating an automatic irrigation and fertilization system for the greenhouse. You want to check on her progress.

* **Prompt:** Greet Vanilla

**Chief:** It looks like your irrigation system is complete?

**Vanilla:** Not yet... The water supply system is working... but biocontrol has failed.

**Vanilla:** Animals have trespassed and trampled over the crops... hindering growth... and compacting the soil.

* **Prompt:** Observe

**System Notifications:** There are signs of frolicking over the lush green plants and even a vague human-sized star shape.

**Chief:** Hmm, this trace looks like it was left by a person.

**Vanilla:** A person?

**Chief:** Because of your irrigation system, the plants in this area are the densest. Someone must have enjoyed a basking session lying here.

**Chief:** They probably mistook the crops for regular grass, since they haven't borne fruit yet.

**Vanilla:** Need to design a new control system, against humans... Humans are... intelligent, courageous, and strategic.

**Vanilla:** ...Harder to guard against than monsters.

**Vanilla:** Must prepare stronger security devices... An electric fence.

* **Prompt:** Stop her directly
 * **Chief:** The greenhouse is a public area. No hazardous devices.
 * **Vanilla:** Cage traps?
 * **Chief:** Still sounds quite dangerous. No.

* **Prompt:** Look for other solutions
 * **Chief:** Put up a //No Sleeping on Crops// sign.
 * **Chief:** Indicate with text and an image that these are edible plants and should not be crushed.
 * **Vanilla:** Will it work...
baseVoicelines:
[Obtain the Sinner]
A discrepancy in the mechanical operation... Did you cause it... What changes will you bring to the future?

[Raise to Phase 1]
Debugging completed... I can go even further now...

[Raise to Phase 3]
The end of change... is eternity...

[Level Start]
This is a necessary process...

[Win Battles]
I create the machines to assist you. Go, I'll always be here.

[Lose Battles]
It's just one failed attempt. Take everyone back. I'll repair all the damaged parts.

[Ultimate Skill]
It ends here!

[Die in Battles]
Everything will eventually come to a standstill at some point.

[Greeting]
You seem a bit different... Discrepancies arise over time. How long has it been... since we last met?

[Conversation 1]
Behavior... must be guided by rules... A broken machine... will only lead one into eternal deviation... I'll fix it for you...

[Conversation 2]
Don't change... Don't deny it... Stay accurate... Stay... stable... I won't break... My existence will reach the final border...

[Conversation 3]
From springs and cogs... to bearings and internal combustion engines... to circuits and semiconductors... Humans today,technology a century later from my time... What will it look like...

[Special Conversation 1]
In DisSea, all laws are distorted... Time, space, and even memory... are no longer trustworthy... Perhaps what I'm obsessed with is something that can be relied upon in this torrent.

[Special Conversation 2]
Time won't twist a person's mind... Despair will... Remember your purpose. Remember the earliest promise. This way... even if you're caught up by despair... it can't devour you...

[Special Conversation 3]
So this is what the world outside DisSea looks like now... I thought... the scenery there, the never-ending disaster, and my watchtower... would never change... until eternity...

[Full Compliance]
I didn't understand the meaning of our encounter before... But now, I do... It's like eternal gears being worn down, errant currents returning to their source... Your arrival signaled... the everlasting first second has passed.

[Idle]
Time's passing... at the normal rate... I'm not used to it yet...

[Annoyed]
Why repeat such movements? Your limbs are probably malfunctioning... Let me inspect and repair them for you now...

[Special Attention]
When my companions feel lost, they often come to me... I guess people are always seeking unchanging things as anchors in turmoil... Are you the same? Are you... feeling uneasy?

[Dispatch]
This is my direction...

[Dispatch Complete]
No deviation in the return path... I'm home.

[Level Up]
It's more stable now...

[Pat Head]
There's no switch here. You can't turn me off...
supervision6:
++* ⚠⚠⚠ New Friends

//Vanilla has made some new friends within the Bureau.//

**System Notifications:** Vanilla always immerses herself in machines and appears rather solitary and aloof. Initially, people in the Bureau were hesitant to approach her. But they've quickly discovered that she keeps her promises and is a trustworthy partner. Many have since befriended her.

**System Notifications:** There's a downside to this though. Once you get roped in by those tricksters, awkward situations like this are inevitable.

**System Notifications:** Vanilla blocks the entrance to the kitchen, not allowing anyone inside.

**Chief:** Vanilla, step aside. This door isn't worth guarding.

**Vanilla:** Do not come close.

**Vanilla:** I've promised... to never leave... until they come out...

**System Notifications:** You hear from the kitchen the sound of someone rummaging for snacks, opening the packaging, and chewing stealthily. Yet, Vanilla's presence prevents you from seeing who it is.

**System Notifications:** Alarm:
Warning, unauthorized consumption of the kitchen's reserves is a violation.

* **Prompt:** Ask

**Chief:** Who's inside? Some new friends you've made?

**Vanilla:** Important companions...

**Vanilla:** I've promised them to guard the reserves... No one is allowed to enter...

**Chief:** I'll just take a look inside.

**Vanilla:** They specifically told me to... beware of Chief.

* **Prompt:** Encourage her to make friends
 * **Chief:** It's good that you're making friends. But next time, don't agree to everything they ask.

* **Prompt:** Shout to those inside
 * **Chief:** Own up to your bad idea! Who's that? Don't hide behind Vanilla and steal snacks!
 * **System Notifications:** But there's no response.
nightmareTalent: Gains a 7% Max HP boost each time entering a [Void Rift] or [Moonlight Rift]. The boost is capped at 35%.
emotionCheck2:
[Vanilla stares intently at a malfunctioning damaged clock.] 

**Vanilla:** Eternal time once again shifts off course... I must... repair it... 

**Chief:** ......

* **Prompt:** Try changing the battery. 
 * **Vanilla:** Distortion corrected... Could you be... the anchor point for my return... 
 * **Vanilla:** 😐

* **Prompt:** A tap should do the trick.
 * **Vanilla:** Disassembly... followed by repair... You did the right thing...
 * **Vanilla:** 😐

voicelines.Obtain the Sinner - EN: A discrepancy in the mechanical operation... Did you cause it... What changes will you bring to the future?
voicelines.Obtain the Sinner - JP: 機械の動作のズレは……アンタが原因か……アンタは未来に……どんな変化をもたらすんだ？
voicelines.Obtain the Sinner - KR: 기계 작동 오류… 너 때문인가…? 넌 미래에… 어떤 변화를 가져다줄까?
voicelines.Obtain the Sinner - CN: 机械运作出现偏差……是你造成的么……你会给未来……带去怎样的改变？
voicelines.Obtain the Sinner - TW: 機械運作出現偏差……是你造成的嗎……你會給未來……帶去怎樣的改變？
voicelines.Raise to Phase 1 - EN: Debugging completed... I can go even further now...
voicelines.Raise to Phase 1 - JP: デバッグが完了した……これで更に前へ進める……
voicelines.Raise to Phase 1 - KR: 테스트 완료… 이제 더 멀리 갈 수 있겠군…
voicelines.Raise to Phase 1 - CN: 调试完成……我能走得更远了……
voicelines.Raise to Phase 1 - TW: 調試完成……我能走得更遠了……
voicelines.Raise to Phase 3 - EN: The end of change... is eternity...
voicelines.Raise to Phase 3 - JP: 変化の終わりは……永遠だ……
voicelines.Level Start - JP: これは経験しなければならないプロセスだ……
voicelines.Win Battles - EN: I create the machines to assist you. Go, I'll always be here.
voicelines.Win Battles - JP: 機械はアンタたちを助けるために作られているんだ。行け、私はずっとここにいる。
voicelines.Win Battles - KR: 기계를 만드는 건 너희를 도와주기 위해서야. 가, 난 언제나 여기 있을게.
voicelines.Win Battles - CN: 制造机械就是为协助你们。去吧，我永远都在。
voicelines.Win Battles - TW: 製造機械就是為協助你們。去吧，我永遠都在。
voicelines.Lose Battles - EN: It's just one failed attempt. Take everyone back. I'll repair all the damaged parts.
voicelines.Lose Battles - JP: たった一回失敗しただけだ。全員連れ戻せ。私が全て修復する。
voicelines.Lose Battles - KR: 한번 실패한 것뿐이야. 모두를 데리고 돌아가, 내가 전부 고쳐줄게.
voicelines.Lose Battles - CN: 一次失败而已。带大家回去吧，我会修复所有损耗。
voicelines.Lose Battles - TW: 一次失敗而已。帶大家回去吧，我會修復所有損耗。
voicelines.Die in Battles - EN: Everything will eventually come to a standstill at somepoint...
voicelines.Die in Battles - JP: やがて機械が止まる日がやってくる……
voicelines.Greeting - EN: You seem a bit different... Discrepancies arise over time. How long has it been... since we last met?
voicelines.Greeting - JP: アンタ、少し変わったか？……時間は偏差をもたらす。私たちが最後に会ってから……どれくらい経った？
voicelines.Greeting - KR: 뭔가 달라 보이는데?… 시간에 편차가 생겼어. 우리가 마지막으로 만난 뒤로… 얼마나 시간이 흐른 거지?
voicelines.Greeting - CN: 你看起来有些不一样……时间带来偏差，距离我们上一次见面……过去多久了？
voicelines.Greeting - TW: 你看起來有些不一樣……時間帶來偏差，距離我們上一次見面……過去多久了？
voicelines.Conversation 1 - EN: Behavior... must be guided by rules... A broken machine... will only lead one into eternal deviation... I'll fix it for you...
voicelines.Conversation 1 - JP: 行動には……基準が必要だ……壊れた機械は……人を永遠に道から外れさせる……私が代わりに……直そう……
voicelines.Conversation 1 - KR: 행동엔… 기준이 필요해… 망가져 버린 기계는… 영원히 사람을 미로에 빠지게 하지… 내가 대신… 고쳐줄게…
voicelines.Conversation 1 - CN: 行为……需要标尺……坏掉的机器……只会让人陷入永恒的偏航……我来替你……修好它……
voicelines.Conversation 1 - TW: 行為……需要標尺……壞掉的機器……只會讓人陷入永恆的偏航……我來替你……修好它……
voicelines.Conversation 2 - EN: Don't change... Don't deny it... Stay accurate... Stay... stable... I won't break... My existence will reach the final border...
voicelines.Conversation 2 - JP: 変わらず……否定せず……精確で……安定を……保つ……私は壊れない……私という存在は最後のフロンティアまで到達する……
voicelines.Conversation 2 - KR: 변하지 말고… 부정하지 마… 정확도를 유지하고… 침착해… 난 망가지지 않을 거야… 나의 존재는 최후의 경계에 다다를 거야…
voicelines.Conversation 2 - CN: 不要改变……不要否定……保持精确……保持……稳定……我不会损坏……我的存在将抵达最后的边界……
voicelines.Conversation 2 - TW: 不要改變……不要否定……保持精確……保持……穩定……我不會損壞……我的存在將抵達最後的邊界……
voicelines.Conversation 3 - EN: From springs and cogs... to bearings and internal combustion engines... to circuits and semiconductors... Humans today, technology a century later from my time... What will it look like...
voicelines.Conversation 3 - JP: ぜんまいや歯車から……軸受けや内燃機関へ……そして電気回路や半導体へ……今の人類や100年後のテクノロジーは……どうなっているんだろうな……
voicelines.Conversation 3 - KR: 태엽과 톱니바퀴에서… 베어링과 내연기관을 지나… 전기 회로와 반도체에 이르기까지… 지금의 인류와 백년 뒤의 기술은… 또 어떤 모습일지…
voicelines.Conversation 3 - CN: 从发条和齿轮……到轴承和内燃机……再到电路和半导体……如今的人类，百年后的技术……又是怎样的光景……
voicelines.Conversation 3 - TW: 從發條和齒輪……到軸承和內燃機……再到電路和半導體……如今的人類，百年後的技術……又是怎樣的光景……
voicelines.Special Conversation 1 - EN: In DisSea, all laws are distorted... Time, space, and even memory... are no longer trustworthy... Perhaps what I'm obsessed with is something that can be relied upon in this torrent.
voicelines.Special Conversation 1 - JP: 内海では、全ての法則が改ざんされている……時間も、空間も、記憶も……もう信用できない……私が執着しているのは、きっとこの大きな流れの中で頼りになるものだ。
voicelines.Special Conversation 1 - KR: 디스씨의 모든 법칙은 조작됐어… 시공간과 기억까지… 더 이상 믿을 수 없어… 내가 집착하는 건 어쩌면 이 거센 물결 속에서 의지할 수 있는 어떤 무언가일지도 모르지.
voicelines.Special Conversation 1 - CN: 内海之中，一切法则都被篡改……时间、空间，包括记忆……都不再值得信任……我执着的，也许是这洪流中可以依靠的东西。
voicelines.Special Conversation 1 - TW: 內海之中，一切法則都被篡改……時間、空間，包括記憶……都不再值得信任……我執著的，也許是這洪流中可以依靠的東西。
voicelines.Special Conversation 2 - EN: Time won't twist a person's mind... Despair will... Remember your purpose. Remember the earliest promise. This way... even if you're caught up by despair... it can't devour you...
voicelines.Special Conversation 2 - JP: 時間が人の心を歪めることはない……そうさせるのは絶望だ……アンタの目的を、最初の約束を覚えておけ。そうすれば……たとえ絶望に追いつかれても……飲み込まれたりはしない……
voicelines.Special Conversation 2 - KR: 시간은 사람의 마음을 왜곡시키지 않아… 마음을 왜곡시키는 건 절망이지… 너의 목적을 기억하고, 처음의 약속을 잊지 마. 그러면… 절망에 쫓기더라도… 잡아먹히지는 않을 거야.
voicelines.Special Conversation 2 - CN: 时间不会扭曲一个人的心智……绝望才会……记住你的目的，记住最初的承诺，这样的话……就算被绝望追上……你也不会被它吞噬……
voicelines.Special Conversation 2 - TW: 時間不會扭曲一個人的心智……絕望才會……記住你的目的，記住最初的承諾，這樣的話……就算被絕望追上……你也不會被它吞噬……
voicelines.Special Conversation 3 - EN: So this is what the world outside DisSea looks like now... I thought... the scenery there, the never-ending disaster, and my watchtower... would never change... until eternity...
voicelines.Special Conversation 3 - JP: 内海の外の世界は……こうなってしまったのか……私は……この光景が、終わることのない災害が、私の監視塔が……永遠が来るまで……ずっと変わらないと思っていた……
voicelines.Special Conversation 3 - KR: 디스씨 밖의 세상은… 벌써 이런 모습이 되었구나… 그곳의 모습, 끊임없는 재난, 나의 초소는… 영원이 올 때까지… 그 모습 그대로 일 줄 알았는데…
voicelines.Special Conversation 3 - CN: 内海外的世界……原来已经是这副模样了……我本以为……那里的景象、不息的灾难、我的哨塔……直到永恒来临前……都不会改变……
voicelines.Special Conversation 3 - TW: 內海外的世界……原來已經是這副模樣了……我本以為……那裡的景象、不息的災難、我的哨塔……直到永恆來臨前……都不會改變……
voicelines.Full Compliance - EN: I didn't understand the meaning of our encounter before... But now, I do... It's like eternal gears being worn down, errant currents returning to their source... Your arrival signaled... the everlasting first second has passed.
voicelines.Full Compliance - JP: 前は、アンタとの出会いが何を意味するのか分かっていなかった……でも今は理解できる……不朽の歯車が滑らかになり、方向を間違えた電流が原点に戻るように……アンタの到来は、私に……永遠の最初の1秒が過ぎたことを教えてくれたんだ。
voicelines.Full Compliance - KR: 과거의 난, 너와의 만남이 어떤 의미인지 몰랐어… 하지만 이젠 알겠어… 녹슬지 않는 톱니바퀴가 닳아 없어지고, 어긋난 전류가 원점으로 돌아오듯… 널 만난 순간… 영원은 이미 시작되었다는 걸.
voicelines.Full Compliance - CN: 以前我并不知道，与你的相遇意味着什么……但现在，我明白了……就像不朽的齿轮被磨平，错向的电流回归原点……你的到来告诉我……永恒的第一秒，已经过去。
voicelines.Full Compliance - TW: 以前我並不知道，與你的相遇意味著什麼……但現在，我明白了……就像不朽的齒輪被磨平，錯向的電流回歸原點……你的到來告訴我……永恆的第一秒，已經過去。
voicelines.Idle - EN: Time's passing... at the normal rate... I'm not used to it yet...
voicelines.Idle - JP: 時間……正しい流れ……本当に……慣れないな……
voicelines.Idle - KR: 시간이… 제대로 흐르고 있어… 정말 낯선 기분이야…
voicelines.Idle - CN: 时间……正常的流速……还真是……不习惯……
voicelines.Idle - TW: 時間……正常的流速……還真是……不習慣……
voicelines.Annoyed - EN: Why repeat such movements? Your limbs are probably malfunctioning... Let me inspect and repair them for you now...
voicelines.Annoyed - JP: なぜこのような動きを繰り返す？アンタの手足は故障しているのかもしれないな……すぐ修理しよう……
voicelines.Annoyed - KR: 왜 이런 동작을 반복하는 거야? 혹시 고장이라도 난 건가… 내가 고쳐줄게…
voicelines.Annoyed - CN: 为什么重复这种动作？你的肢体大概出了故障……我这就帮你检修……
voicelines.Annoyed - TW: 為什麼重複這種動作？你的肢體大概出了故障……我這就幫你檢修……
voicelines.Special Attention - EN: When my companions feel lost, they often come to me... I guess people are always seeking unchanging things as anchors in turmoil... Are you the same? Are you... feeling uneasy?
voicelines.Special Attention - JP: 仲間は、迷った時によく私の所に来ていた……多分、人間というのは混乱の中でも変わらない錨を求めるんだろう……アンタもそうなのか？アンタは……不安を感じるのか？
voicelines.Special Attention - KR: 동료들은 막막할 때마다 날 찾곤 해… 사람들은 항상 혼란 속에서 변하지 않는 것을 버팀목으로 삼지… 너도 그래? 너도… 불안함을 느껴?
voicelines.Special Attention - CN: 同伴感到迷茫时，常常来找我……大概人都会在动荡中寻求不变的东西作为锚点……你也是如此吗？你……感到不安吗？
voicelines.Special Attention - TW: 同伴感到迷茫時，常常來找我……大概人都會在動盪中尋求不變的東西作為錨點……你也是如此嗎？你……感到不安嗎？
voicelines.Dispatch Complete - EN: No deviation in the return path... I'm home.
voicelines.Dispatch Complete - JP: 帰り道は外れていない……戻ったぞ。
voicelines.Dispatch Complete - CN: 返程的道路没有偏离……我回来了。
voicelines.Dispatch Complete - TW: 返程的道路沒有偏離……我回來了。
voicelines.Pat Head - EN: There's no switch here. You can't turn me off...
voicelines.Pat Head - JP: ここにはスイッチがない。私の電源を……落とすことはできない……
voicelines.Pat Head - KR: 거긴 전원 버튼이 없어, 넌 나를… 끌 수 없어…
voicelines.Pat Head - CN: 这里没有开关，你无法关闭……我……
voicelines.Pat Head - TW: 這裡沒有開關，你無法關閉……我……
